thread.title: Refugees risk death by frostbite WALKING from US to Canada | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Refugees risk death by frostbite WALKING from US to Canada | Daily Mail Online

title: Refugees risk death by frostbite WALKING from US to Canada | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad Refugees lose fingers to frostbite as they WALK to Canada from the U.S. -because they fear being sent back to their home countries Refugee groups in Canada claim they have seen examples of people walking across frozen ground from the United States They say they are people who fear not being able to stay in the U.S. because of a more hostile environment towards refugees Numbers arriving at Canada's land border with the U.S. and claiming refugee status was already up dramatically in 2016 Liberal prime minister Justin Trudeau's pledge to accept refugees in 2015 is seen as helping drive the influx Published: 18:30 GMT, 6 February 2017 | Updated: 11:33 GMT, 7 February 2017 87 shares
